original: Nasaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na saññojanam dhammam paṭicca saññojanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Naganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na gantham dhammam paṭicca ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Naoghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na ogham dhammam paṭicca oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Nayogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na yogam dhammam paṭicca yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Nanīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Naparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca parāmāsaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
